thread.section_title: Hotel le Chat Noir - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great little Hotel -
thread.title_full: Great little Hotel - Review of Hotel le Chat Noir, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PJS67
title: Great little Hotel -
text:
Great little hotel, well positioned the heart of Mont Matre. Walk up hill towards Sacre Coure to the best areas. The hotel is in a very lively, bustling area, not for the prim, proper or naive amongst you. Lots of Restaurants bars & clubs within a mile & the Metro is a 5 minute walk.
Only criticism, no milk or teabags to make tea in the room when we arrived but when we asked it was supplied.
Clean room & bathroom, comfortable beds. Enjoyed our stay& would return.
